resources.string: Enter the name of the song
You have to enter the artist!
The first character can not be a space or dot.
This tabulature is already exist in your favorites
Are you sure, you want to delete?
Maybe the SD card is not mounted?
Unable to write to external storage.
This tablature was added to favorites, but its title or artist was edited. Do you still want to add to favorites?
Orientation of the screen is locked
Orientation of the screen is unlocked
Add a song title of performer
You have to choose performer from the list to continue
You have to choose title from the list to continue
Unknown error with read/write on SDCard to config file
Unknwon error with connect to service
Thank you for downloading this app and click Help to view summary of this program functions.
Display help, where should be a description how to use app and what is the funcionality of this app.\n And more other stuff.
Menu button which shows short informations and which can be used to shows help.
Menu button to toggle bar. Not available for tablets.
Button which moves to search tablature via Internet.
Button which moves to search tablature in Favorites.
Additional option which replaces (3) and (4) buttons is ability to move to the next screen by swipe your finger gesture.
Button for go back to main screen from any other screen.
Menu button to turn off wifi. This icon informs wifi is enabled.
Menu button which informs mobile data is on.\n - If you can\'t see this button, it means mobile data is off or wifi is enabled (2).\n - Pressing button turns off mobile data.
Menu button to enable wifi. This icon informs wifi is off.\n - Additionally if mobile data is on (3), then if you press this button mobile data will turn off and hides icon (3).
This button allows you to start searching performer/song on every search screen.\n - Search is performed by finding identical to the input string in available names of performers/songs.

Place to input name of the performer/song or string, which this performer/song should contains.\n - If you don\'t type any character and start searching, you\'ll get all the possibilities.*\n * Performer search screen via Internet is an exception, where first typed character is a first letter of searching performer/song.
List of performers/songs found, where if you choose one of the options move to the next screen.
You can go back to previous screen if you press \"back\" button on device or if you swipe back on the screen.

Menu button in tablature screen via Internet to add displayed tablature to favorites.\n - If this tablature is already exists in favorites or if you changed name this performer/song in favorites will be displayed message.
Menu button to open web browser to search lyrics of this song.
Menu button in tablature screen in favorites to remove displayed tablature.

Menu button in tablature screen to create on internal memory file with a displayed tablature, which allows edit this tablature.
 - After re-displayed this tablature it's actual and replaced previous in favorites and the file is automatically deleted from memory.
 - Path: /sdcard/Android/pl.tabhero/performer_name-song_name.tablature_id.txt
 - To update tablature from the file don't change the name of this file.
Name of the performer and the song bar.\n - If you touch this bar at the bottom of the screen appear buttons plus and minus (6).
Buttons to small decrease and increase displayed tablature character size.

Displayed tablature.\n - You can decrease or increase tablature size by pinch gesture on this tablature.\n - On long touch on this tablature at the bottom of the screen will be apper a padlock icon (8).
Buttons to lock or unlock orientation of the screen.
Tablature screen are blocked to automatically off.
Menu button to move to remove screen.
Menu button to add your own performer/song to favorites.
List of favorites performers/songs where if you choose one of these options move to the next screen.\n - On long touch on one of these options you can chanege name of this performer/song.
You can go back to previous screen if you press \"back\" button on device or if you swipe back on the screen.
Menu button to invert selection, e.g.: all selected options will be cleared, all unselected will be selected.
Button to remove all selected performers (and all their songs) or all selected songs.
Any comments about the application send via e-mail. Job offers will be also acceptable :)
Button to lock orientation of the screen
Button to unlock orientation of the screen
Button to decrease character size of the tablature
Button to increase character size of the tablature
